name: Shattered (itch) (acont14)
description:
Explore what seems to be an abusive household in search of the fragments of your heart. Jump over obstacles, move objects, and avoid the the glass as you make your way across each level.

Theme

Broken

Features

  • Several objects to jump or knock over as you make your way across the levels
  • Heavenly light to help you overcome obstacles by making you jump higher and farther
  • Glass shards scattered everywhere ( sharp and deadly )
  • Cars by E75 from 2D Car Traffic Racer Free on Unity Asset Store
  • Foliage by Kittens and Elves at Work from Backyard Top-Down Tileset on Unity Asset Store
  • Desk chair, computer desktop, computer screen, and desk by mercyssh from Simple Office Furniture Set on itch.io
  • Wardrobe by asakuraki from 16 x 16 Tileset on itch.io
  • Tv and fridge by assetbakery from Horror Houses Tileset on itch.io
  • Living room furniture, books, door, shelf, window, curtains, walls, floor, and wallpaper by Kvazi from 2D Room on Unity Asset Store
  • Level design by Axel Contreras
